name: New Year's Day
theme: Celebrate New Year's Day with fresh Bahamian brunch specials and sparkling cocktails—invite locals & tourists to start this year with us!

name: Majority Rule Day
theme: Honor Majority Rule Day with national cuisine feast & history—share pride & culture, drive midday lunch traffic!

name: Valentine's Day
theme: Romantic Valentine's dinner at our restaurant—candlelit tables, prix-fixe menu, shared desserts—perfect for couples!

name: Good Friday
theme: Serve seafood specials for Good Friday—highlight fresh catch & traditions, drive family customers to beachside lunch!

name: Easter Monday Cookout
theme: Easter Monday cookout: grilled fish, sides, family fun—create a flavorful outdoors event to boost midday weekend sales!

name: Labour Day
theme: Celebrate Labour Day parade with brunch buffet & bottomless mimosas—invite early risers during long weekend!

name: Independence Day
theme: Independence Day celebration with Bahamian BBQ, patriotic cocktails, live Junkanoo beats—sell out early dinner slots!

name: Emancipation Day
theme: Emancipation Day beach feast celebrating freedom—family meals with Bahamian staples, boost midday resort bookings!

name: National Heroes' Day
theme: Hero-themed lunch: named dishes after Bahamian icons, offer specials—honor heroes and attract patriotic crowds!

name: Culinary & Arts Festival
theme: Join Bahamas Culinary & Arts Festival with chef tasting menu—elevate fine dining and attract foodies with exclusive event.

name: Christmas Eve
theme: Magical Christmas Eve dinner with festive decor, holiday drinks, cozy tables—reserve early for holiday & family diners!

name: Christmas Day
theme: Christmas Day brunch buffet—holiday classics & local flavors, family-friendly, pre-booked seats only!

name: Boxing Day Junkanoo
theme: Celebrate Boxing Day with live Junkanoo parade outside—drinks & quick bites, capture festive crowds post-parade!

name: Weekend Weekend Brunch
theme: It's Saturday Brunch Time! Promote bottomless brunch with live music, mimosa specials—capture weekend crowd!

name: Bahamas Bowl
theme: Cheer on the Bahamas Bowl with game night pizzas & wings—get your friends together and score big with our stadium-style specials!

name: Eid al‑Fitr
theme: Celebrate Eid al‑Fitr with a feast of halal delights—rich biryani, sweet treats & family platters perfect for post-fast joy.

name: Holi Festival
theme: Brighten Holi with colorful dessert platters and fruity mocktails—perfect for vibrant, joyous sharing on social media!

name: Good Friday
theme: Serve seafood specials for Good Friday—highlight fresh catch & traditions, drive family customers to beachside lunch!

name: Eid al‑Adha
theme: Mark Eid al‑Adha with a lamb feast—succulent grills, family platters & sweet baklava—bring everyone to break bread together.

name: Raksha Bandhan
theme: Celebrate Raksha Bandhan with sibling duo dessert promo—share a sweet treat on us when you bring your brother or sister!

name: Daily Happy Hour
theme: Unwind every day with our Happy Hour—half-price cocktails and appetizers from 5-7pm!

name: Bi-Weekly Ladies' Night
theme: Every other Thursday is Ladies' Night—complimentary drinks for ladies and live DJ!

name: Monthly Wine Tasting
theme: Join us every first Friday for a curated wine tasting event—explore new flavors each month!

name: Quarterly Seasonal Menu Launch
theme: Experience our new seasonal menu—launched every quarter with fresh, local ingredients!

name: Bi-Annual Customer Appreciation Day
theme: Twice a year, we celebrate you! Enjoy exclusive discounts, free samples, and live entertainment.
